outputs.output_descr:
1.1Development of the screening tool
1.2 Risk-screening of programming documents/projects, and adjustment of programming procedures in the pilot countries
1.3 Capacity development of UNDP COs, UNCTs and other relevant stakeholders in the pilot countries
1.4 Synthesis and dissemnation of lessons learned through the ALM, RIOCC, UNEP Regional Offices
2.1 Integration of climate change risks into national development policies in pilot countries
2.2 Coordination with regional and global stakeholders (e.g. UNDP BCPR, UNEP Regional Offices, RIOC and other climate change networks)
2.3 Synthesis and dissemination of lessons learned through the ALM and regional networks including the UNEP and the RIOCC

5 pilot countriesscreened:
their UN programming document (a total of 12 documents were screened at various levels of detail) and adaptation measures were identified.
government develoment plans (a total of 11 documents were screened at various levels of detail) and adpatation measures were identified.
5 Project pages and 3 Country experience pages were set up on the Adaptation Learning Mechanism.
Draft cilmate risk screening findings were validated with stakeholders. 
All workshops received high evaluations from participants.

project_descr: Integrating Climate Change Risks into Development and Planning July 2009
project_title: Integrating CC Risks into Nat'l Dev. Processes...
